0.text: social media has played a central role in the human society from early 2010s.

1.text: one incredibly popular network at the time was facebook.

2.text: in 2012 mark zuckerberg's creation already had about 150 million desktop users and 67 million mobile users.

3.text: these numbers changed a year later with approximately 30 million more people logging in from their phone app.

4.text: consequently this is followed by a 20 million decrease in desktop users on facebook, as many of them probably switched to mobi.e.

5.text: other than the survey about preferences in devices to use, research on reasons for using this particular network has been carried out.

6.text: it showed that the main reasons for women were sharing pictures and seeing entertaining and humorous publications on the site.

7.text: the male population seemed to consider receiving updates and sharing photos as two equally important reasons of their choice of facebook.

8.text: another less significant, although considered among the main ones, reason is learning about ways to help others.
